FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.q1: Can I really see this website for free?
FAQ.a1: Yes, you can examine the work we prepared specifically for your OSGB for 7 days without paying any fee. When you decide, you proceed to the payment stage.
FAQ.q2: Is the website ready, or are you showing a draft?
FAQ.a2: The site you will see with the preview code we send you is a work that is 90% ready for publication, with your logo, colors, contact information and services added.
FAQ.q3: Can I request edits (revisions) during the review process?
FAQ.a3: You have a total of 3 revision rights for 7 days. Scope: text edits, minor visual changes, content alignments.
FAQ.q4: Can revisions be made after purchase?
FAQ.a4: Yes, but new page addition or structural change requests to be made after publication are charged as additional services.
FAQ.a5: You can make your payment via our secure payment infrastructure with credit card or via bank transfer option.
